sources.title: Don't Bother To Knock (1952) Marilyn Monroe, Richard Widmark, Anne Bancroft, Elisha Cook Jr
sources.description: Don't Bother to Knock is a 1952 American FILM NOlR thriller starring Richard Widmark and Marilyn Monroe and directed by Roy Ward Baker.   The screenplay was written by Daniel Taradash, based on the 1951 novel Mischief by Charlotte Armstrong.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and read an article from FILM NOlR of the Week.

sources.title: Don't Bother To Knock (1952) Almas Desesperadas
sources.description: Um mulher muito atraente, mas com tendências suicidas, recebe alta de uma instituição mental e consegue emprego como babá em um hotel de luxo. Ela começa a perseguir um dos hóspedes, convencida de que é seu marido morto.

metadata.Plot: Airline pilot Jed stays at the New York hotel where girlfriend Lyn is a singer. He sees Nell in a window opposite his and they get chummy. When the girl she's baby-sitting, Bunny, enters Nell goes crazy and sends her to her room. She fantasizes that Jed is her long lost fiance. Jed comes to realize that Nell is more than a little whacko.
metadata.Actors: Richard Widmark, Marilyn Monroe, Anne Bancroft
